sections.heading: Transfer of Powers and Duties of the Orv Trails Advisory Committee in Sections 16b and 16c of Act 26 of 1995 to the Commission of Natural Resources by a Type III Transfer; Abolish Orv Trails Advisory Committee
sections.text: Transfer of Powers and Duties of the Orv Trails Advisory Committee in Sections 16b and 16c of Act 26 of 1995 to the Commission of Natural Resources by a Type III Transfer; Abolish Orv Trails Advisory Committee.
